thread.title: Worry about guns crossing border, not Mexicans
thread.title_full: Worry about guns crossing border, not Mexicans - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Worry about guns crossing border, not Mexicans
text: Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Tuesday continued his call for tougher national gun-control laws, likening the federal government’s inaction to leaving a “back door” open for assault weapons to cross into New York. In an interview on WNYC-FM’s “Brian Lehrer Show,” Cuomo again called on Democrats to threaten a government shutdown unless Republicans back a series [...] The post Cuomo: Worry about guns crossing border, not Mexicans appeared first on Politics on the Hudson. Click on the headline for the rest of this blog post ... ...
